name: Simple Pasta Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, and pancetta.
recipeIngredient: Salt and black pepper to taste
recipeInstructions: Cook pasta according to package directions. While pasta cooks, fry pancetta until crispy. In a bowl, whisk eggs and Parmesan. Drain pasta (reserve 1 cup pasta water). Toss hot pasta with pancetta, then remove from heat. Quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water to create a creamy sauce. Season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately with extra Parmesan.

name: Overnight Oats
description: Healthy make-ahead breakfast with oats, milk, and your favorite toppings.
recipeIngredient: Toppings: fresh berries, nuts, banana slices
recipeInstructions: In a jar or container, combine oats, milk, yogurt, chia seeds, honey, and vanilla. Stir well. Cover and refrigerate overnight (at least 8 hours). In the morning, stir and add your favorite toppings. Enjoy cold or heat in microwave for 1-2 minutes.
